title: MS AccessSpace()Function

metadata.description: Learn about MS AccessSpace()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
❯
Example
Return a string with 5 spaces:
SELECT 
  Space(5) AS SpaceString;

Definition and Usage
The Space() function returns a string of the specified number of space characters.
Syntax
Space(
number
)
Parameter Values
Parameter
Description
number
Required. The number of spaces to be returned
Technical Details
Works in:
From Access 2000

❯
★
+1

summary: This tutorial covers MS AccessSpace()Function concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use MS AccessSpace()Function effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of MS AccessSpace()Function and how to apply it in your projects.
